001import javax.swing.*;
002import java.awt.*;
003import java.awt.event.*;
004import java.net.URL;
005
006/**
007 * This class implements a simple graphical user interface with a
008 * text entry area, a text output area and an optional image.
009 *
010 * @author Michael Kolling
011 * @version 1.0 (Jan 2003) DB edited (2023)
012 */
013public class UserInterface implements ActionListener
014{
015    private GameEngine aEngine;
016    private JFrame     aMyFrame;
017    private JTextField aEntryField;
018    private JTextArea  aLog;
019    private JLabel     aImage;
020
021    /**
022     * Construct a UserInterface. As a parameter, a Game Engine
023     * (an object processing and executing the game commands) is
024     * needed.
025     *
026     * @param pGameEngine  The GameEngine object implementing the game logic.
027     */
028    public UserInterface( final GameEngine pGameEngine )
029    {
030        this.aEngine = pGameEngine;
031        this.createGUI();
032    } // UserInterface(.)
033
034    /**
035     * Print out some text into the text area.
036     */
037    public void print( final String pText )
038    {
039        this.aLog.append( pText );
040        this.aLog.setCaretPosition( this.aLog.getDocument().getLength() );
041    } // print(.)
042
043    /**
044     * Print out some text into the text area, followed by a line break.
045     */
046    public void println( final String pText )
047    {
048        this.print( pText + "\n" );
049    } // println(.)
050
051    /**
052     * Show an image file in the interface.
053     */
054    public void showImage( final String pImageName )
055    {
056        String vImagePath = "" + pImageName; // to change the directory
057        URL vImageURL = this.getClass().getClassLoader().getResource( vImagePath );
058        if ( vImageURL == null )
059            System.out.println( "Image not found : " + vImagePath );
060        else {
061            ImageIcon vIcon = new ImageIcon( vImageURL );
062            this.aImage.setIcon( vIcon );
063            this.aMyFrame.pack();
064        }
065    } // showImage(.)
066
067    /**
068     * Enable or disable input in the entry field.
069     */
070    public void enable( final boolean pOnOff )
071    {
072        this.aEntryField.setEditable( pOnOff ); // enable/disable
073        if ( pOnOff ) { // enable
074            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 500 ); // cursor blink
075            this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this ); // reacts to entry
076        }
077        else { // disable
078            this.aEntryField.getCaret().setBlinkRate( 0 ); // cursor won't blink
079            this.aEntryField.removeActionListener( this ); // won't react to entry
080        }
081    } // enable(.)
082
083    /**
084     * Set up graphical user interface.
085     */
086    private void createGUI()
087    {
088        this.aMyFrame = new JFrame( "My GAME" ); // change the title !
089        this.aEntryField = new JTextField( 34 );
090
091        this.aLog = new JTextArea();
092        this.aLog.setEditable( false );
093        JScrollPane vListScroller = new JScrollPane( this.aLog );
094        vListScroller.setPreferredSize( new Dimension(200, 200) );
095        vListScroller.setMinimumSize( new Dimension(100,100) );
096
097        this.aImage = new JLabel();
098
099        var aButton = new JButton("Help");
100        aButton.addActionListener( this );
101        JPanel vPanel = new JPanel();
102        vPanel.setLayout( new BorderLayout() ); // ==> only five places
103        vPanel.add( this.aImage, BorderLayout.NORTH );
104        vPanel.add( vListScroller, BorderLayout.CENTER );
105        vPanel.add( this.aEntryField, BorderLayout.SOUTH );
106        vPanel.add( aButton, BorderLayout.EAST );
107
108        this.aMyFrame.getContentPane().add( vPanel, BorderLayout.CENTER );
109
110        // add some event listeners to some components
111        this.aEntryField.addActionListener( this );
112
113        // to end program when window is closed
114        this.aMyFrame.addWindowListener(
115                new WindowAdapter() { // anonymous class
116                    @Override public void windowClosing(final WindowEvent pE)
117                    {
118                        System.exit(0);
119                    }
120                } );
121
122        this.aMyFrame.pack();
123        this.aMyFrame.setVisible( true );
124        this.aEntryField.requestFocus();
125    } // createGUI()
126
127    /**
128     * Actionlistener interface for entry textfield.
129     */
130    @Override public void actionPerformed( final ActionEvent pE )
131    {
132        if (pE.getSource() instanceof JButton) {
133            this.aEngine.interpretCommand("help");
134            return;
135        }
136        // no need to check the type of action at the moment
137        // because there is only one possible action (text input) :
138        this.processCommand(); // never suppress this line
139    } // actionPerformed(.)
140
141    /**
142     * A command has been entered in the entry field.
143     * Read the command and do whatever is necessary to process it.
144     */
145    private void processCommand()
146    {
147        String vInput = this.aEntryField.getText();
148        this.aEntryField.setText( "" );
149
150        this.aEngine.interpretCommand( vInput );
151    } // processCommand()
152} // UserInterface
